reviewText: I mostly use this DVD as a review tool and so far its worked wonderfully. It can be a bit campy at times and the filter effects in the ending demo videos are obnoxious but its definitely a useful learning tool.
I would give it a 1 but the reason I gave it a 2 is there was bout one trick I learned from it. Very unstructured teaching and most of the lessons I wouldn't ever use during spinning.
